original_text: Abigail quickly got some food. She got 200 loaves of bread, two leather bags of wine, five sheep that she had cooked, and five jars of grain that she had cooked. She also got 100 blocks of raisins and 200 blocks of dried figs. She put all these things on some donkeys.
korean_text: 아비가일이 급히 떡 이백 덩이와 포도주 두 가죽 부대와 잡아서 요리한 양 다섯 마리와 볶은 곡식 다섯 세아와 건포도 백 송이와 무화과 뭉치 이백 개를 가져다가 나귀들에게 싣고

sentences.korean_translation: 가죽 가죽 가방 두 개에 와인을 담고,

sentences.original_text: five sheep that she had cooked,
and five jars of grain that she had cooked.
She also got 100 blocks of raisins
She put all these things on some donkeys.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 이 모든 것들을 나귀들 위에 올렸다.
